data.textUthmani: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا نَـٰجَيْتُمُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَقَدِّمُوا۟ بَيْنَ يَدَىْ نَجْوَىٰكُمْ صَدَقَةً ۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ وَأَطْهَرُ ۚ فَإِن لَّمْ تَجِدُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا [O you who believe] ٱلَّذِينَ [O you who believe] ءَامَنُوٓا۟ [O you who believe] إِذَا [When] نَـٰجَيْتُمُ [you privately consult] ٱلرَّسُولَ [the Messenger] فَقَدِّمُوا۟ [then offer] بَيْنَ [before] يَدَىْ [before] نَجْوَىٰكُمْ [your private consultation] صَدَقَةًۭ ۚ [charity] ذَٰلِكَ [That] خَيْرٌۭ [(is) better] لَّكُمْ [for you] وَأَطْهَرُ ۚ [and purer] فَإِن [But if] لَّمْ [not] تَجِدُوا۟ [you find] فَإِنَّ [then indeed] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] غَفُورٌۭ [(is) Oft-Forgiving] رَّحِيمٌ [Most Merciful]
data.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanooitha najaytumu arrasoola faqaddimoo baynayaday najwakum sadaqatan thalika khayrunlakum waatharu fa-in lam tajidoo fa-inna Allahaghafoorun raheem

data.textUthmani: ءَأَشْفَقْتُمْ أَن تُقَدِّمُوا۟ بَيْنَ يَدَىْ نَجْوَىٰكُمْ صَدَقَـٰتٍ ۚ فَإِذْ لَمْ تَفْعَلُوا۟ وَتَابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْكُمْ فَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: ءَأَشْفَقْتُمْ [Are you afraid] أَن [to] تُقَدِّمُوا۟ [offer] بَيْنَ [before] يَدَىْ [before] نَجْوَىٰكُمْ [your private consultation] صَدَقَـٰتٍۢ ۚ [charities] فَإِذْ [Then when] لَمْ [you do not] تَفْعَلُوا۟ [you do not] وَتَابَ [and Allah has forgiven] ٱللَّهُ [and Allah has forgiven] عَلَيْكُمْ [you] فَأَقِيمُوا۟ [then establish] ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ [the prayer] وَءَاتُوا۟ [and give] ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ [the zakah] وَأَطِيعُوا۟ [and obey] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۚ [and His Messenger] وَٱللَّهُ [And Allah] خَبِيرٌۢ [(is) All-Aware] بِمَا [of what] تَعْمَلُونَ [you do]
data.transliteration: Aashfaqtum an tuqaddimoo bayna yaday najwakumsadaqatin fa-ith lam tafAAaloo watabaAllahu AAalaykum faaqeemoo assalatawaatoo azzakata waateeAAoo Allahawarasoolahu wallahu khabeerun bimataAAmaloon

data.textUthmani: ۞ أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ تَوَلَّوْا۟ قَوْمًا غَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مَّا هُم مِّنكُمْ وَلَا مِنْهُمْ وَيَحْلِفُونَ عَلَى ٱلْكَذِبِ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ
data.wordByWord: ۞ أَلَمْ [Do not] تَرَ [you see] إِلَى [[to]] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] تَوَلَّوْا۟ [take as allies] قَوْمًا [a people] غَضِبَ [wrath] ٱللَّهُ [(of) Allah] عَلَيْهِم [(is) upon them] مَّا [They (are) not] هُم [They (are) not] مِّنكُمْ [of you] وَلَا [and not] مِنْهُمْ [of them] وَيَحْلِفُونَ [and they swear] عَلَى [to] ٱلْكَذِبِ [the lie] وَهُمْ [while they] يَعْلَمُونَ [know]
data.transliteration: Alam tara ila allatheenatawallaw qawman ghadiba Allahu AAalayhim mahum minkum wala minhum wayahlifoona AAalaalkathibi wahum yaAAlamoon

data.textUthmani: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ سَآءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَعَدَّ [Allah has prepared] ٱللَّهُ [Allah has prepared] لَهُمْ [for them] عَذَابًۭا [a punishment] شَدِيدًا ۖ [severe] إِنَّهُمْ [Indeed, [they]] سَآءَ [evil is] مَا [what] كَانُوا۟ [they used to] يَعْمَلُونَ [do]
data.transliteration: aAAadda Allahu lahum AAathabanshadeedan innahum saa ma kanoo yaAAmaloon

data.textUthmani: ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ أَيْمَـٰنَهُمْ جُنَّةً فَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُّهِينٌ
data.wordByWord: ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ [They have taken] أَيْمَـٰنَهُمْ [their oaths] جُنَّةًۭ [(as) a cover] فَصَدُّوا۟ [so they hinder] عَن [from] سَبِيلِ [(the) way of Allah] ٱللَّهِ [(the) way of Allah] فَلَهُمْ [so for them] عَذَابٌۭ [(is) a punishment] مُّهِينٌۭ [humiliating]
data.transliteration: Ittakhathoo aymanahum junnatanfasaddoo AAan sabeeli Allahi falahum AAathabunmuheen

data.textUthmani: لَّن تُغْنِىَ عَنْهُمْ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَـٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
data.wordByWord: لَّن [Never] تُغْنِىَ [will avail] عَنْهُمْ [them] أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ [their wealth] وَلَآ [and not] أَوْلَـٰدُهُم [their children] مِّنَ [against] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] شَيْـًٔا ۚ [(in) anything] أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [Those] أَصْحَـٰبُ [(will be) companions] ٱلنَّارِ ۖ [(of) the Fire] هُمْ [they] فِيهَا [in it] خَـٰلِدُونَ [will abide forever]
data.transliteration: Lan tughniya AAanhum amwaluhum walaawladuhum mina Allahi shay-an ola-ika as-habuannari hum feeha khalidoon

data.textUthmani: يَوْمَ يَبْعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعًا فَيَحْلِفُونَ لَهُۥ كَمَا يَحْلِفُونَ لَكُمْ ۖ وَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمْ عَلَىٰ شَىْءٍ ۚ أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْكَـٰذِبُونَ
data.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(On the) Day] يَبْعَثُهُمُ [Allah will raise them] ٱللَّهُ [Allah will raise them] جَمِيعًۭا [all] فَيَحْلِفُونَ [then they will swear] لَهُۥ [to Him] كَمَا [as] يَحْلِفُونَ [they swear] لَكُمْ ۖ [to you] وَيَحْسَبُونَ [And they think] أَنَّهُمْ [that they] عَلَىٰ [(are) on] شَىْءٍ ۚ [something] أَلَآ [No doubt] إِنَّهُمْ [Indeed, they] هُمُ [[they]] ٱلْكَـٰذِبُونَ [(are) the liars]
data.transliteration: Yawma yabAAathuhumu Allahu jameeAAanfayahlifoona lahu kama yahlifoona lakum wayahsaboonaannahum AAala shay-in ala innahum humu alkathiboon

data.textUthmani: ٱسْتَحْوَذَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فَأَنسَىٰهُمْ ذِكْرَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ حِزْبُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ ۚ أَلَآ إِنَّ حِزْبَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
data.wordByWord: ٱسْتَحْوَذَ [Has overcome] عَلَيْهِمُ [them] ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ [the Shaitaan] فَأَنسَىٰهُمْ [so he made them forget] ذِكْرَ [(the) remembrance] ٱللَّهِ ۚ [(of) Allah] أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [Those] حِزْبُ [(are the) party] ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ ۚ [(of) the Shaitaan] أَلَآ [No doubt] إِنَّ [Indeed] حِزْبَ [(the) party] ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ [(of) the Shaitaan] هُمُ [they] ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ [(will be) the losers]
data.transliteration: Istahwatha AAalayhimu ashshaytanufaansahum thikra Allahi ola-ika hizbuashshaytani ala inna hizba ashshaytanihumu alkhasiroon

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى ٱلْأَذَلِّينَ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] يُحَآدُّونَ [oppose] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ [and His Messenger] أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [those] فِى [(will be) among] ٱلْأَذَلِّينَ [the most humiliated]
data.transliteration: Inna allatheena yuhaddoona Allahawarasoolahu ola-ika fee al-athalleen

data.textUthmani: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغْلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِىٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌ
data.wordByWord: كَتَبَ [Allah has decreed] ٱللَّهُ [Allah has decreed] لَأَغْلِبَنَّ [Surely, I will overcome] أَنَا۠ [I] وَرُسُلِىٓ ۚ [and My Messengers] إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] قَوِىٌّ [(is) All-Strong] عَزِيزٌۭ [All-Mighty]
data.transliteration: Kataba Allahu laaghlibanna anawarusulee inna Allaha qawiyyun AAazeez
